extendedInfo.description: A fun, private messaging and calendaring app for your family to stay connected and coordinated throughout the day. With FREE group text, FREE voice messages, a shared family calendar and more, the Family Pointâ¢ app is the perfect tool for families on-the-go. FEATURES: â FREE TEXT MESSAGING with your entire familyâ FREE VOICE MESSAGING with your entire familyâ SHARED FAMILY CALENDAR* Stay Connected with your family throughout the day. Send free, unlimited messages as text or voice to the entire family, all-at-once, in the Family Stream. * Your Family Calendar upgraded Plan and view all your family activities and events in the shared family calendar. Make it clear who is picking up the kids from school and practice. Know when everyone in the family is free or busy. * Instant Voice Messages Send and receive unlimited free voice messages. Voice messages appear in the Family Stream and can be listened to (audio) or read (text transcripts)  * For your familyâs eyes only Only family members who accept your invitation to the app can see your family's calendar and messages. This is not a public social network. REQUIREMENTS: - Comcast ID or Comcast.net email address and password - Internet connectivity on device (e.g. WiFi, 3G) - Android 4.0+ABOUT US: Comcast Labs offers customers an opportunity to evaluate new product and service concepts from Comcast. Our engineers develop and test new technologies and services that may turn into new products or become part of existing products. Based on customer feedback some products may never leave the lab environment. Contact us (1-888-517-5296 or familyapp@sv.comcast.com) if you have any issues with the app or suggestions on how to improve it in the future. HOW IT WORKS 1. Sign in with your primary Comcast user account. 2. Invite (via SMS or email) your family members during setup. 3. Your family members create secondary Comcast accounts using the invitation email/SMS, and then log into the app with these accounts.

reviews.title: Calendar
reviews.comment: Love the linked calendar feature something I been wanting to do for a while so family is synced
reviews.author: Craig Sarsfield

reviews.title: Cozi is better
reviews.comment: This is free and has a month view calendar.  Cozi just has more functionality.  Xfinity keep working on this.
reviews.author: Lawrence Novakowski

reviews.title: Great Start
reviews.comment: Wonderful way to keep the family on the same page! Keep adding features. Crisp.
reviews.author: Coretta Jackson

reviews.title: Great and free
reviews.comment: It helps me keep the kids on schedule and in contact with them. Great, and I am expecting new features to be added in the future!
reviews.author: Ron Black
